section.title: External Connectors
section.description: Connect to external platforms to sync your roster

sportAdmin.title: SportAdmin
sportAdmin.description: Sync your team roster from SportAdmin

disconnect.title: Disconnect {{provider}}?
disconnect.subtitle: This will stop automatic synchronization
disconnect.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to disconnect {{provider}}?
disconnect.reassureData: Existing attendance and match data will be preserved
disconnect.reassureReconnect: You can reconnect at any time

info.description: Enter your SportAdmin credentials to enable automatic synchronization.
info.security: Your credentials will be encrypted and stored securely.

validation.usernameMaxLength: Username must be 100 characters or less
validation.passwordMaxLength: Password must be 200 characters or less
validation.connectionFailed: Failed to connect SportAdmin. Please check your credentials and try again.

connectorsSection.title: Connectors
connectorsSection.infoBanner: Connect external team management platforms to automatically sync practice attendance and match schedules.
connectorsSection.connectedSuccess: SportAdmin connected successfully! Verification in progress (takes up to 5 minutes)...
connectorsSection.immediateSyncFailed: Immediate sync failed, will run on schedule.

onboarding.syncDescription: Connect to your team management platform to automatically sync your roster and practice attendance.

unmappedBanner.title: Players Available to Match
unmappedBanner.description: You have unmapped players from {{providerName}} waiting to be matched to your roster.
